Reviews.Title: Not made in Japan....
Reviews.Author: curlyNoodles
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera so much so that it's like packing a camera and 10 assorted lenses and a dozen filters in your shirt pocket!!! The only drawback is that I thought it is made in Japan since the seller is listed as from Japan. To my disappointment, camera is made in China.

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: Mengjiao
Reviews.Content: I placed the order like a week ago, I just got it today. Obviously this was shipped from Japan and I can't believe that I got the camera really quick! Works very well especially for 12 levels facial features. Love it a lot!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: zoehon
Reviews.Content: Received camera in good condition and fast!  Wrapping carefully n red color is pretty! The camera is solid and not too bulky,fits nicely in my handbag where ever I go.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: fannie
Reviews.Content: The camera is good, but I did not get my color. I think you have to check your stock first, and then received money. Everything is good. I like the camera and the service attitude from you.
